cppcoreguidelines-narrowing-conversions.description:
Description

This check implements part of
ES.46
from the C++ Core Guidelines.

The
cppcoreguidelines-narrowing-conversions
check is an alias, please see
bugprone-narrowing-conversions
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-narrowing-conversions.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
